alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:16PM CDT until July 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR LAFAYETTE...GREEN...SOUTHEASTERN IOWA AND SOUTHWESTERN DANE COUNTIES... At 216 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Glarus to Shullsburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Darlington, New Glarus, Shullsburg, Monticello, Albany, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Waldwick, Fayette, Lamont, Hollandale, Browntown and Gratiot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
